text: al-Yaarubiyah (), also known as Daliha (), is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Located halfway between Azaz and al-Rai, approximately north of the city of Aleppo and south of the border to the Turkish province of Kilis, the village administratively belongs to Nahiya Sawran in Azaz District. Nearby localities include Baraghida to the southwest and Dudiyan to the southeast. In the 2004 census, al-Yaarubiyah had a population of 552. ==References==
title: Al-Yaarubiyah, Aleppo Governorate
